file_summary.overview: This file contains user session data tracking user interactions on a web platform, including login/logout times, device information, and browsing behavior.

key_columns.name: session_id
key_columns.description: Unique identifier for each user session

key_columns.name: login_time
key_columns.description: When the user logged into the platform

key_columns.name: pages_visited
key_columns.description: Number of pages visited during the session

key_columns.name: device_type
key_columns.description: Type of device used (mobile, desktop, tablet)

data_patterns: Sessions have clear start and end times
Users access platform from different devices and browsers
Geographic distribution of users across different locations
Session durations vary significantly (15 minutes to 1+ hours)
data_relationships: Each user_id can have multiple session_ids over time
Login_time always precedes logout_time for valid sessions
content_analysis.value_distributions: Mix of mobile and desktop users, various browsers represented, global user base with time zone considerations

issues_found: All timestamps appear to be in UTC format
data_quality.completeness: All required fields are populated in the sample data

key_findings: Platform has active users across different time zones
Users engage with multiple pages per session
Session durations indicate engaged user behavior
analysis_opportunities: Identify peak usage times and geographic patterns
Analyze session duration vs engagement metrics
Compare user behavior across device types
Track user retention and session frequency

data_preparation: Convert timestamps to appropriate time zones for analysis
Calculate session duration as a derived field
Standardize location data for geographic analysis
analysis_approaches: Time series analysis for usage patterns
tools_and_methods: Use data visualization tools for session flow analysis
Apply statistical analysis for behavior patterns

file_summary.overview: This file contains detailed sales transaction records including customer information, product details, pricing, and sales representative data for business performance analysis.

key_columns.name: transaction_id
key_columns.description: Unique identifier for each sales transaction

key_columns.name: customer_id
key_columns.description: Unique identifier linking to customer records

key_columns.name: total_amount
key_columns.description: Final transaction amount in monetary value

data_patterns: Each transaction has complete product and pricing information
Sales representatives are tracked for each transaction
data_relationships: Total_amount should equal quantity Ã— unit_price
Sales_rep can be used for performance tracking
content_analysis.value_distributions: Product-focused transactions with consistent pricing structure and sales attribution

data_quality.completeness: All transaction fields are properly populated

key_findings: Sales rep attribution enables performance analysis
Multiple payment methods indicate customer flexibility
analysis_opportunities: Analyze seasonal sales patterns by category
Optimize pricing strategies based on transaction data

data_preparation: Ensure date formats are consistent for time series analysis
analysis_approaches: Revenue analysis by time periods and categories
Customer segmentation based on purchase behavior
tools_and_methods: Business intelligence dashboards for sales tracking
